languages.text: Благодаря добытому Лорд-капитаном передатчику повстанцев, офицеры сил планетарного гарнизона вступили в изощренную {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-игру, вмешиваясь в переговоры мятежников, дезинформируя их и сея параноидальные настроения.

traits.locale_text: Благодаря добытому Лордом-капитаном вокс-передатчику повстанцев, офицеры сил планетарной обороны вступили в изощренную вокс-игру, вмешиваясь в переговоры мятежников, дезинформируя их и сея параноидальные настроения.

languages.text: Using the rebels' transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary garrison engaged in an elaborate {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.
languages.original_text: Благодаря добытому Лорд-капитаном передатчику повстанцев, офицеры сил планетарного гарнизона вступили в изощренную {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-игру, вмешиваясь в переговоры мятежников, дезинформируя их и сея параноидальные настроения.

traits.locale_text: Using the rebels' vox-transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary defense forces engaged in an elaborate vox-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.

Using the rebels' vox-transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary defense forces engaged in an elaborate vox-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.

Using the rebels' vox-transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary defense forces engaged in an elaborate vox-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.

Using the rebels' transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary garrison engaged in an elaborate {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.

Using the rebels' transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary garrison engaged in an elaborate {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンが収奪した反乱軍の送信機を使い、惑星守備隊の幹部は{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}による手の込んだ情報戦に取り組んだ。反乱軍の討議を妨害して偽情報を拡散するとともに、反乱軍の中に疑心暗鬼の種をまいた。
languages.original_text: Using the rebels' transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary garrison engaged in an elaborate {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンが収奪した反乱軍の送信機を使い、惑星守備隊の幹部は{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}による手の込んだ情報戦に取り組んだ。反乱軍の討議を妨害して偽情報を拡散するとともに、反乱軍の中に疑心暗鬼の種をまいた。

languages.text: 行星驻军的军官利用舰长大人缴获的叛军发报机，精心策划了一场{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}游戏，用来干扰叛军通讯，散布虚假情报，让叛军如惊弓之鸟。
languages.original_text: Using the rebels' transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary garrison engaged in an elaborate {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.

traits.locale_text: 行星驻军的军官利用舰长大人缴获的叛军发报机，精心策划了一场{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}游戏，用来干扰叛军通讯，散布虚假情报，让叛军如惊弓之鸟。

languages.text: Usando el transmisor rebelde capturado por {mf|el Lord Capitán|la Lord Capitán}, los oficiales de la guarnición planetaria iniciaron una elaborada guerra de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vocos{/g} interceptando las conversaciones de los rebeldes, divulgando información falsa y sembrando la desconfianza entre sus filas.
languages.original_text: Using the rebels' transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary garrison engaged in an elaborate {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.

traits.locale_text: Usando el transmisor rebelde capturado por {mf|el Lord Capitán|la Lord Capitán}, los oficiales de la guarnición planetaria iniciaron una elaborada guerra de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vocos{/g} interceptando las conversaciones de los rebeldes, divulgando información falsa y sembrando la desconfianza entre sus filas.

languages.text: Die Offiziere der Garnison des Planeten benutzten den vom Lord Captain beschafften Rebellentransmitter bei einem komplexen {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Spiel, indem sie Gespräche der Rebellen störten, Fehlinformationen verbreiteten und Paranoia in ihren Reihen säten.
languages.original_text: Using the rebels' transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary garrison engaged in an elaborate {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.

traits.locale_text: Die Offiziere der Garnison des Planeten benutzten den vom Lord Captain beschafften Rebellentransmitter bei einem komplexen {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Spiel, indem sie Gespräche der Rebellen störten, Fehlinformationen verbreiteten und Paranoia in ihren Reihen säten.

languages.text: Profitant de l'émetteur pris aux rebelles par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, les officiers de la garnison planétaire entamèrent un jeu-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} complexe en interférant dans les discussions de l'ennemi, en propageant de fausses informations et en semant la paranoïa dans ses rangs.
languages.original_text: Using the rebels' transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary garrison engaged in an elaborate {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.

traits.locale_text: Profitant de l'émetteur pris aux rebelles par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, les officiers de la garnison planétaire entamèrent un jeu-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} complexe en interférant dans les discussions de l'ennemi, en propageant de fausses informations et en semant la paranoïa dans ses rangs.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın ele geçirdiği isyancı vericisini kullanan gezegen garnizonu subayları, detaylı bir {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} oyunu başlattı. Bu vesileyle isyancıların iletişimine engel oldular, çarpıtılmış bilgiler yaydılar ve isyancı saflarında paranoyaya sebebiyet verdiler.
languages.original_text: Using the rebels' transmitter captured by the Lord Captain, the officers of the planetary garrison engaged in an elaborate {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-game, interfering in the rebels' discussions, spreading disinformation, and sowing paranoia within their ranks.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın ele geçirdiği isyancı telsizini kullanan gezegen garnizonu subayları, detaylı bir {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} oyunu başlattı. Bu vesileyle isyancıların iletişimine engel oldular, çarpıtılmış bilgiler yaydılar ve isyancı saflarında paranoyaya sebebiyet verdiler.
